name: IMT Care
headline: Disrupting Indian Insurance space by empowering distrubutors
description:
India’s insurance market is filled with bygone products, which do not cater to 95% of the market's demand for specific products such as illness-specific insurance, primary care with insurance, and surgical insurance to name a few. 

We, at IMT, aim to target this white space by creating innovative products that fulfill this new demand by empowering the agents. Agents are the largest insurance distribution channel in India and cover 85% of the premium collection. 

Agents collect 20B premium every year. With a 5% take rate, it’s a 1B dollar market opportunity growing at 22% CAGR.

Kunal has 15+ years of experience working with insurance companies and building agent networks, while he scaled his brokerage business to 3M dollars in revenue. Rachit has 12+ years of experience in building tech products, he was a founding engineer at Payu (stripe of India).

founders.name: Rachit Puri, Founder
founders.description: Entrepreneur || Engineer || Product Manager. 11+ years of experience in building health tech and fintech products worked as an engineer, team leader, product management, people, and stakeholder management.

founders.name: Kunal Popat, Founder
founders.description: I have worked as CEO of a successful insurance broking company for more than 5 years in my previous assignment . I loved the role but was excited about innovating through technology and spread health care and insurance deeply within the country . This motivated us to start www.insuremyteam.com along with my cofounder ,Rachit Puri. We are on an fun filled journey to make healthcare accessible and affordable to millions of employees and thier families . Thanks.

**IMT Care: Revolutionizing Indian Insurance**

Founded in 2021, IMT Care is on a mission to shake up the Indian insurance landscape. The traditional market is bogged down by outdated products that fail to meet the specific needs of the majority—about 95%—of consumers. Rather than sticking to the status quo, IMT Care aims to bridge this gap by offering innovative insurance solutions, especially in areas like illness-specific insurance and primary care, all while empowering the agents who sell these products.

Why focus on agents? Well, they’re crucial to the Indian insurance ecosystem, accounting for a whopping 85% of all premium collections—around $20 billion annually. This positions IMT Care nicely within a potential market opportunity exceeding $1 billion, growing at a healthy 22% CAGR. By implementing a 5% take rate on premiums, they stand to capture significant revenue.

At the helm are Kunal and Rachit, two seasoned professionals. Kunal comes with over 15 years of experience in the insurance industry and has successfully scaled his brokerage to $3 million in revenue. Rachit, with 12 years under his belt, is a tech prodigy who was a founding engineer at PayU, often dubbed the "Stripe of India."

Operating out of India with a compact team of 23, IMT Care is also part of the prestigious Y Combinator Batch W22. Their platform boasts various offerings, including:

- **Employee Benefits:** Elevating corporate client experiences with a user-friendly benefits platform.
- **Customer Connect:** A branded app helping agents manage multiple policies and customer interactions effortlessly.
- **Travel Assurance:** Insurance products designed for travelers.

Moreover, IMT Care enhances the insurance experience by providing a white-label platform tailored for brokers and agents, making operations simpler and automating numerous processes. They partner with leading insurers and Third Party Administrators (TPAs) to create seamless integrations for their users.

If you're curious about how IMT Care is streamlining insurance in India, you can find more about their services and insights on their [website](https://www.imt.care).

To wrap it up, IMT Care represents a fresh approach in the insurance sector by focusing on both innovation and agent empowerment. This dual emphasis could very well set the stage for a more responsive and customer-focused insurance ecosystem in India.
